Text: thank you. have been searching for this for months. do you know of a comic called 'broz' ?

Ehhmmm... can't say I heard of it.

Which language is it? Is it a webcomic or hardcover comic? Can you perhaps give me a link to a description?

thanks a million  for your work. i live in aus , so comics can be hard to find, love 2000 ad, all euro comics really -. i bought many graphic novels when i travelled o.s.... and would never have known that chevalier requiem was a proper series(got a quick look through sporadic  heavy metal purchases.)  ledroit is awesome... BROZ i believe is art by adrian smith, maybe published in french. not sure... thanks again, you are a wonderful creature. heh.

translation pirate i dont know how to make links sorry. i think its also nickel editions there is a page here                                   http://www.comicartfans.com/GalleryPiece.asp?Piece=660727&GSub=101606

No scanlations available as far as I can see :/

I have the French version as CBZ if you just want to look at the pretty artwork?..
